# gen-instance-from-dist-mat
generate instance of 3D points from distance matrix

# Usage
```
make
./a.out
```

## Example
```
target
0.000 1.071 0.446 2.208 3.457 0.379 6.299 3.833 4.223 4.172
1.071 0.000 1.285 1.750 2.296 1.763 3.513 3.136 5.852 2.580
0.446 1.285 0.000 1.264 2.547 0.478 4.371 3.729 3.473 3.622
2.208 1.750 1.264 0.000 0.254 1.341 1.586 1.165 1.842 0.814
3.457 2.296 2.547 0.254 0.000 2.361 1.249 0.614 2.125 0.195
0.379 1.763 0.478 1.341 2.361 0.000 5.563 2.495 2.089 3.070
6.299 3.513 4.371 1.586 1.249 5.563 0.000 3.408 5.867 1.736 
3.833 3.136 3.729 1.165 0.614 2.495 3.408 0.000 1.731 0.319
4.223 5.852 3.473 1.842 2.125 2.089 5.867 1.731 0.000 2.690
4.172 2.580 3.622 0.814 0.195 3.070 1.736 0.319 2.690 0.000
instance
```
